description: Summary information about the current state of an essence component file as accessible through the API.

LastPartition.description: Inclusive index of the last partition in the essence component file.

FileClosed.description: Status of the essence component file, as to whether it is: 'open' - accepting new access units; 'closing' - not accepting new access units but file may not yet be closed and complete; 'closed' - not accepting access units and file is closed and complete on the store.

EditRate.description: Edit rate for the essence as a rational value in format <numerator>/<denominator>, e.g. 60000/1001.

Duration.description: Count of the total number of edit units accessible from the essence component file.

AccessUnitType.description: Indication of the type of essence contained in the file. Full information should be retrieved from the MXF file descriptor available through the '/descriptor', '/stream' and '/aaf-xml' sub-resources.
